actions.text: Amendment SA 901, under the order of 06/26/19, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 8. Record Vote Number: 184.
Amendment SA 901 proposed by Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S4541-4542) In the nature of a substitute.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 901, under the order of 06/26/19, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 84 - 8. Record Vote Number: 184.
